descriptor.name: Swiss Fine Chocolate Silk Ice Cream [140 ML]
descriptor.short_desc:
Wanderer Ingredient: Swiss Chocolate

Our tours to Swiss chocolate factories left us dazzled! We picked a luxury chocolate brand & a locally popular brand & made this velvety, silky smooth ice cream.
descriptor.long_desc:
Wanderer Ingredient: Swiss Chocolate

Our tours to Swiss chocolate factories left us dazzled! We picked a luxury chocolate brand & a locally popular brand & made this velvety, silky smooth ice cream.
